name: Flipping Birds Game
description:
Flipping Birdies!!

THIS IS NOT FLAPPY BIRDS!

Are you ready to play the New Smash HIT?

Take on a whole New Bird Flapping Challenge with a New Twist on the Classic Flappy, Endless Runner Game!

Introducing Flipping Birds!

With Dual Bird Actions you will truly experience a entirely New gaming experience!!!

Simply tap your finger on Top or Bottom of Screen to Flip Birdies over the approaching pipes for as long as you can to build the highest score possible.

With Game Center Intergraded, this game is perfect for challenging friends to see who can Last The Longest building the Highest Score Possible.

But Thats Not All...

You can Play alone or Play 2 Players at the Same Time (1 top & 1 bottom) helping each other to Leader Board Domination.

The next viral "Smash" has arrived and you can be the first to download it!

FREE Updates!

Download it Now!
